title: Herbal Heaven
description: An e-commerce platform for selling herbal products, featuring React for the frontend and a Node.js backend with an intuitive user interface and secure payment integration.

title: To-Do List App
description: A simple React-based to-do list application that helps users organize tasks efficiently with features like task prioritization and status updates.

title: SLIITXtreme 3.0 Website
description: Contributed to the development of the sponsors' section for SLIITXtreme 3.0, leveraging React for a modern and responsive design.

title: Petition Data Manager
description: A Flutter and Firebase-powered project for handling petitions, enhanced with a React-based web interface for monitoring and managing petition data.
